Sacrifice:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 「アタック」以外のカードを 廃棄 する。 廃棄 するごとに、 炎信仰 を !M! 得る。 NL 廃棄 。

YinYangSange:ReiMu.NAME: 陰陽散華
YinYangSange:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 信仰 を得るたび、 NL !M! のランダムな 信仰 を得る。
YinYangSange:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 天賦 。 NL W 信仰 を得るたび、 NL !M! のランダムな 信仰 を得る。

InherentArray:ReiMu.NAME: 永久結界
InherentArray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 天賦 。 NL 飛行 を失うたび、 稲妻信仰 を !M! 得る。 NL HPを失うたび、 風信仰 を !M! 得る。
InherentArray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 天賦 。 NL カードを引くたび、 月信仰 を !M! 得る。 NL 廃棄 するたび、 炎信仰 を !M! 得る。

ForcedLanding:ReiMu.NAME: 不時着
ForcedLanding:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 飛行 : 飛行 を1失い敵全体に !D! ダメージを与える。 NL 雷信仰 を !M! 得る。

SubAcupoint:ReiMu.NAME: 亜空点穴
SubAcupoint:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: !D! ダメージを与える。 NL 飛行 : このターン対象は 筋力 !M! を失う。 NL それ以外: 飛行 1 を得る。

WonderfulDomain:ReiMu.NAME: Nine-Syllable
WonderfulDomain:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for every !M! Faith.

Meditation:ReiMu.NAME: Meditation
Meditation:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill. NL Gain [E] and !M! Moon Faith.
Meditation:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is a Skill. NL Gain [E] [E] and !M! Moon Faith.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Skill cards in my hand.

Stagnation:ReiMu.NAME: Floating
Stagnation:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Flight: Draw !M! card. NL Otherwise: Gain 1 Flight.
Stagnation:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flight: Gain 1 Flight. NL Otherwise: Draw !M! card. Retain.

FantasyMoon:ReiMu.NAME: Illusionary Moon
FantasyMoon:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Gain !M! random Faith. NL Exhaust.
FantasyMoon:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Upgraded cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Gain !M! random Faith. NL Exhaust.

SpreadBorder:ReiMu.NAME: 扩散灵符
SpreadBorder:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 获得2层 山之信 。并在回合结束时获得 !M! 点 格挡 ，其值每回合减半 。

MikOfLucky:ReiMu.NAME: Miko Of Lucky
MikOfLucky:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)
MikOfLucky:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of your turn, add !M! random O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

Determination:ReiMu.NAME: Determination
Determination:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your lost HP. NL Exhaust.
Determination:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your lost HP.

Sign:ReiMu.NAME: O-mikuji
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL When Retained, Transform into a higher *Luck *Level.

LearningPray:ReiMu.NAME: High-Speed Prayer
LearningPray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Moon Faith. NL Add a Learning O-mikuji into your hand.
LearningPray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Moon Faith. NL Add a Learning O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

CareerPray:ReiMu.NAME: Prosperity Prayer
CareerPray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Destruction Faith. NL Add a Career O-mikuji into your hand.
CareerPray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Destruction Faith. NL Add a Career O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

SafetyPray:ReiMu.NAME: Safety Prayer
SafetyPray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mountain Faith. NL Add a Safe O-mikuji into your hand.
SafetyPray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mountain Faith. NL Add a Safe O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

AirStrike:ReiMu.NAME: Air Strike
AirStrike:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Wind Faith. NL Flight: Activate twice.

PayForSelf:ReiMu.NAME: Yin-Yang Orb
PayForSelf:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage dealt is increased by !D! for every unique debuff on the target.

Amulet:ReiMu.NAME: Homing Amulet
Amulet:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you lose ALL Flight, return this card to your hand.

OrbThrow:ReiMu.NAME: Light Orb into Shade
OrbThrow:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Gain 2 Destruction Faith.

Revelation:ReiMu.NAME: Revelation
Revelation:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Sun Faith.

UpKicking:ReiMu.NAME: Ascension Kick
UpKicking:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flight: Gain [E] and NL draw 1 card.

RainPray:ReiMu.NAME: Rain Dance Ceremony
RainPray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Whenever you play this card, permanently increase it's effect by 2. NL Exhaust.
RainPray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Whenever you play this card, permanently increase it's effect by 3. NL Exhaust.

RunawayExorcism:ReiMu.NAME: Wild Exorcism Dance
RunawayExorcism:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: From within the top !M! cards of your draw pile, play all Attack cards and discard all non-Attack cards.

ManaGlint:ReiMu.NAME: Exorcising Border
ManaGlint:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Flame Faith equal to it's cost. NL Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.
ManaGlint:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Flame Faith equal to double it's cost. Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.

LovePray:ReiMu.NAME: Love Prayer
LovePray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sun Faith. NL Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand.
LovePray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sun Faith. NL Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

YinYang:ReiMu.NAME: Yin-Yang Asuka'i
YinYang:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Flight. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times your Flight.

DependentForm:ReiMu.NAME: Spirit Medium Form
DependentForm:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! random Faith.
DependentForm:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! random Faith.

Enchanting:ReiMu.NAME: Evil-Sealing Circle
Enchanting:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! 脱力. NL Apply !M! 弱体.

Oblation:ReiMu.NAME: 鬼神磷火术
Oblation:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 献祭  !M! :造成 !D! 点伤害。如果杀死敌人，获得5层 请神 。 消耗  。

SealNeedle:ReiMu.NAME: Sealing Needle
SealNeedle:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If it deals unblocked damage, the enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Repeat !M! times. Exhaust.

AirSuppress:ReiMu.NAME: Air Suppress
AirSuppress:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. Gain !M! Wind Faith. NL Flight: Apply 2 弱体 to ALL enemies.
AirSuppress:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies twice. Gain !M! Wind Faith. NL Flight: Apply 3 弱体 to ALL enemies.
